episode.title: It’s a Deep Notch
episode.rawTitle: 231: ‘It’s a Deep Notch’ With Dan Frommer
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Dan Frommer returns to the show. Topics include Apple Watch Series 4 and the notion of third-party watch faces, Google’s Pixel 3 phones and Pixel Slate two-in-one tablet/notebook, and Bloomberg’s disputed “The Big Hack” story.
episode.showNotes:
Dan Frommer returns to the show. Topics include Apple Watch Series 4 and the notion of third-party watch faces, Google’s Pixel 3 phones and Pixel Slate two-in-one tablet/notebook, and Bloomberg’s disputed “The Big Hack” story.

Sponsored by:

  • Casper: Save $50 on select mattresses with code talkshow.
  • Squarespace: Make your next move. Check out with code talkshow for 10% off your first order.
  • Tres Pontas: Freshly-roasted coffee from a single farm in Brazil, shipped directly to you. Use code thetalkshow at checkout and save an extra 10% on any subscription.

Links:

  • Points Party — Dan’s email newsletter on credit card and airline rewards programs.
  • Bloomberg’s disputed “The Big Hack”.
    • Daring Fireball items on the story.
    • Supermicro’s old-school website (even uses a .cfm file extension).
    • Supermicro’s stock dive in the wake.
  • Custom watch faces by Steven Troughton-Smith.
  • David “Underscore” Smith’s retro watch face.
  • The Verge hands-on with on Photoshop for iPad.
  • The new “Palm” phone.
  • Punkt’s minimal MP02 phone.
  • Panic’s late great Status Board app for iPad.

This episode of The Talk Show was edited by Caleb Sexton.
